text: Kristin Cavallari showed off her legs as she modeled shoes from her fall campaign while in Nashville in an alluring Instagram post shared on Friday. That same day the 30 - year - old star revealed which Hills costars she has given parenting advice to as she spoke to the Today show. Turns out the looker has talked babies to Audrina Patridge, who welcomed her daughter last year, and Heidi Montag, who is pregnant with her first child. She did not mention Lauren Conrad or Whitney Port, who are both pregnant with their first children. Nice pins!
